<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scope of Limning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1215)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 182</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Characters with access to firearms gain access to accessories that can be used with those weapons._

**Price** 900 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** attached to firearm (scope)

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The dwarven gunsmiths of Dongun Hold originally created these scopes to help them clear out vermin in underground areas. This scope captures the sound that echoes off a creature hit by the firearm and transforms it into light, illuminating the target for all to see.
